system.availability: Concealed in the Body, internally synthesises up to three substances chosen at implantation (appropriate consumables/drugs). As a Half Action make +10 Toughness Test to self-adminster one of these substances via the gland. Failiure instead causes 1 Fatigue. 4+ Degrees of Failure also deals 1d10 nonpermenant Toughness Damage.
system.cost: Cost does not include Drug Doses which must be acquired seperately.
